# Hydrogen Concentration Measurement System

## Tender Reference and Description
- **Reference Number**: CB-994-73806882
- **Tender Title**: Hydrogen Concentration Measurement System

## Tender Status
- **Publication Date**: 2023-11-20
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-22 14:00:00 (Expired)

## Procurement Details
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Region of Opportunity**: Canada
- **Region of Delivery**: Saguenay, Quebec (except NCR)
- **Delivery Date**: On or before 9 months post-contract award

## Tender Description
- The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) requires a hydrogen concentration measurement system for spot checking and continuous characterization of hydrogen concentrations in liquid aluminum at the NRC Aluminum Technology Center (NRC-ATC) in Saguenay.
- The proposed contract period will be 24 months post-contract award.

## Technical Requirements
- The system must be capable of accurate measurement and continuous characterization of hydrogen concentrations in liquid aluminum.

## Security and Reliability Requirements
- The contractor must have a minimum security level required of Reliability.

## Key Contact Information
- **Contracting Authority**: Paul Hewitt
- **Contact Email**: [Paul.hewitt@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Paul.hewitt@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
- **Phone Number**: 343-573-1068
